scripts.start:electron: npm run build:electron && ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:3000 && electron build/electron/app.js
scripts.prepare:build:folders: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir server && mkdir react-seed-app
scripts.build:electron: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc && cp electron/preload.js build/electron && cp electron/getSasPath.html build/electron
scripts.build:server:api: cd server/api && npm ci && npm run prebuild && npm ci && npm run build && npm run postbuild && cp -r build/. ../../build/server && cp -r node_modules ../../build/server && mv ../../build/server/node_modules ../../build/server/node_modules_tmp
scripts.build:react-seed-app: cd react-seed-app && npm ci && npm run build && cp -r build ../build/react-seed-app
scripts.build: npm run prepare:build:folders && npm run build:electron && npm run build:server:api && npm run build:react-seed-app
scripts.prepare: git rev-parse --git-dir && git config core.hooksPath ./.git-hooks || true
